A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie made me write my first review ever and no I am not an alt-right troll or bot. Adam Driver and John Boyega are bright spots. Though I liked Rey i. TFA and I think Daisy does a good job\, they make her way too powerful for having only recently discovered the force. Rose as a character does not make sense to the story. Lastly\, what Rian Johnson and Disney did to the legacy of Luke Skywalker is nothing short of a cinema travesty. I hope the JJ Abrams can salvage what he started and we can forget this movie ever happened. I award this movie one star and may god have mercy on your souls.
